comments.text:
+TheNugettinage While that may be true, anaerobic respiration produces 
lactic acid in the human body, which is WAY more harsh on various tissues.

comments.text:

way, 100% of humans will die.
comments.author: Eemeli Bergström

comments.text:
+Eemeli Bergström Oh I thought you meant like if we just got a completely 
functioning person and put them into a completely abiotic environment.
comments.author: TheNugettinage

comments.text:
+TheNugettinage Without oxygen, the animals from which we evolved from 
would've died and we wouldn't even exist.
comments.author: Eemeli Bergström

comments.text:
+Eemeli Bergström But as I said before, there is anaerobic cell 
respiration. The cells can produce energy without oxygen, it's just too 
inefficient to support a body for a time that's longer than a few minutes 
or few seconds, but it is long enough for a cancer cell to form.
comments.author: TheNugettinage

comments.text:
+TheNugettinage I guess saying "without oxygen" would mean that it was 
never there in the first place.
comments.author: Eemeli Bergström

comments.text:
+Eemeli Bergström Yeah, but death is not instantaneous after you stop 
breathing, therefore cancer could develop while you're still alive and not 
breathing.
comments.author: TheNugettinage

comments.text:
+TheNugettinage Yes, but if you can't breath and you're dead, you can't 
have cancer either.
comments.author: Eemeli Bergström

comments.text:
+venbrou Anaerobic respiration exists. Don't know whether that's strong 
enough for cancer though.
comments.author: TheNugettinage

comments.text:

captions.text:
Bolt out of your Pikachu bed and into this
Half-Life 2 HEV Suit Hoodie but, hold on,

don’t forget your Assassin’s Creed tri-fold
wallet...you’re gonna need it because I’m
Jake and this is episode #29 of Game LUT.

Clean up those Elder Scrolls Mudcrab plushes
with your DIY 3D Printed Destiny F3 Fusion

Rifle or use a Halo 2 Plasma Rifle Replica
so you can make room for this Millennium Falcon

Rug. Or you join the dark side of the toast
with a Darth Vader Toaster that toasts an

image of Darth on one side and Star Wars on
the other.

Then use your creative force to build a Mario
Clouds Pendant from Adafruit. Continue building

by gathering together the LEGO pieces needed
to create an NES. While crafting becareful
of Creepers, especially ones in anatomy hoodies.

If that TNT pillow in their stomach explodes
block your eyes using Minecraft Sunglasses

and get spirited away in Studio Ghibli shoes.
Just be sure to protect yourself from the

pieces raining down with an Evee-lution Umbrella
or go the extra mile with a Dragon Age: Inquisition

Helmet or be futuristic in a Limited Edition
Mega Man Helmet that has a light-up base.

But you can defend your head from a mind blow
with Vsauce beanies exclusively from Beardo.

They come in green, blue, purple and black
and are 50% off when you use code Vsauce.

It’s your Destiny...retro game poster. That
sure is pretty, and so are these great wargame
prints by artist Patrick Connan…

If you do need to go into battle, suit up
in a Portal Chell Jumpsuit, LED lit Nintendo

Power Glove, official Dragonball Z scouter
and awesome Attack on Titan 3D Maneuvering

gear. Don’t stop the fight until it’s
Game Over...mug. You’ll be a Legend...of

the Hero, a beautiful and detailed full color
book about the myths, monsters, maps, and
weapons of the Legend of Zelda universe.

But if you’re gonna go out, go out in style
with World of Warcraft heels, Guardians of

the Galaxy dress, Game Boy earrings, NES Controller
ring, and put your game pixel pouch in your

sprite purse. Now I don’t want you to catch
cold so bundle up with a Mass Effect N7 winter

coat, pokeball scarf, and you’ll look ace
in that wonderful Street Fighter christmas

sweater. If you get lost, find your way back
with video game map prints...

However, why ever leave your house when you
can play Game Boy in full HD. HDMYboy is a

hardware upgrade that you install into your
existing Game Boy handheld. It then allows

you to output HD video to your display by
redrawing every pixel.

Then play some JAMs from Marvel Rechargeable
character speakers as you sneak into matching

Super Hero sleeping bag suits with a Metal
Gear Solid Nendoroid figure complete with
low poly count face.

Ah, the old pixelated days remind me of Pixel
Empire, who we have featured before, but they

were nice enough to give us 15% off their
incredible prints using code Vsauce…

Now Picture me Rollin’...Tupacamari tshirt
and if you need even more LUT then allow me

to show you the Vsauce Holiday Crate. We teamed
up with LootCrate to give you a box full of

incredibly saucey things. All 6 items were
curated by Michael, Kevin and myself plus

it comes with an exclusive Vsauce shirt that
will only be available in this box. But my

favorite part is that 100% of all the money
that would go to Vsauce, instead goes to Alzheimer’s

Research. So grab a box while you can and
as always, thanks for watching.

title: Darth Vader Toaster and MORE!! -- Game LÜT #29
